name: ObjectnessMeasureImageFilter

members.name: Alpha
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get Alpha, the weight corresponding to R_A (the ratio of the smallest eigenvalue that has to be large to the larger ones). Smaller values lead to increased sensitivity to the object dimensionality.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get Alpha, the weight corresponding to R_A (the ratio of the smallest eigenvalue that has to be large to the larger ones). Smaller values lead to increased sensitivity to the object dimensionality.

members.name: Beta
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get Beta, the weight corresponding to R_B (the ratio of the largest eigenvalue that has to be small to the larger ones). Smaller values lead to increased sensitivity to the object dimensionality.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get Beta, the weight corresponding to R_B (the ratio of the largest eigenvalue that has to be small to the larger ones). Smaller values lead to increased sensitivity to the object dimensionality.

members.name: Gamma
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get Gamma, the weight corresponding to S (the Frobenius norm of the Hessian matrix, or second-order structureness)
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get Gamma, the weight corresponding to S (the Frobenius norm of the Hessian matrix, or second-order structureness)

members.name: ScaleObjectnessMeasure
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Toggle scaling the objectness measure with the magnitude of the largest absolute eigenvalue
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Toggle scaling the objectness measure with the magnitude of the largest absolute eigenvalue

members.name: ObjectDimension
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the dimensionality of the object (0: points (blobs), 1: lines (vessels), 2: planes (plate-like structures), 3: hyper-planes. ObjectDimension must be smaller than ImageDimension.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get the dimensionality of the object (0: points (blobs), 1: lines (vessels), 2: planes (plate-like structures), 3: hyper-planes. ObjectDimension must be smaller than ImageDimension.

members.name: BrightObject
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Enhance bright structures on a dark background if true, the opposite if false.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Enhance bright structures on a dark background if true, the opposite if false.

detaileddescription: This is a composite filter which combines a computation of the hessian with computation of the objectness.
